### **Summary**
I have worked several customer service jobs throughout my years. I have always left my employer's and customers satisfied with my work. I have also performed quite well in my volunteer work. All while working towards a Bachelor's in Biology. I am close to finishing my degree at the Utah Valley University Biology Program. I have held two research posistions within their Microbiology labortory, the first and current under the Mentorship of Dr. Lauren Brooks and the 2nd under Dr. Geoffrey Zahn. I have recieved research funding twice from my research proposals as both an individual and as a research team with fellow students. I am also ~~skilled~~ able to scrap by with the R programming language.
